Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class Draw

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.Draw
public class Draw extends Object
Responsible for generating graphical representations for various objects of the game, such as cards, objectives and card placements

    • cardPlacement

      public static String[] cardPlacement(CardPlacement card)
      Returns the representation of a CardPlacement object
      Parameters:
      card - CardPlacement object to represent
      Returns:
      array of strings, each element is a line of the card placement representation

    • backCard

      public static String[] backCard(Symbol kingdom)
      Returns the representation of the back of a card with a given kingdom
      Parameters:
      kingdom - Symbol object at the back of the card
      Returns:
      array of strings, each element is a line of the card's representation

    • backCard

      public static String[] backCard(PlayableCard card)
      Returns the representation of the back of a PlayableCard object
      Parameters:
      card - PlayableCard object to represent
      Returns:
      array of strings, each element is a line of the card's representation

    • emptyCard

      public static String[] emptyCard()
      Returns the representation of an empty card
      Returns:
      array of strings, each element is a line of the empty card representation

      public static String[] emptyObjective()
      Returns the representation of an empty objective
      Returns:
      array of strings, each element is a line of the empty objective representation

    • frontCard

      public static String[] frontCard(PlayableCard card)
      Returns the representation of the front of a PlayableCard object
      Parameters:
      card - PlayableCard object to represent
      Returns:
      array of strings, each element is a line of the card's representation. Returns an empty card representation if card is null

    • sideStarter

      public static String[] sideStarter(StarterCard card, boolean side)
      Returns the representation of a given side of a StarterCard object
      Parameters:
      card - StarterCard object to represent
      side - true for the front of the card, false for the back
      Returns:
      array of strings, each element is a line of the card's representation

    • starter

      public static String[] starter(StarterCard card)
      Returns the representation of both sides of a StarterCard object
      Parameters:
      card - StarterCard object to represent
      Returns:
      array of strings, each element is a line of the card's representation

      public static String[] objective(Objective o)
      Returns the representation of an objective (of type symbol or disposition)
      Parameters:
      o - Objective object to represent
      Returns:
      array of strings, each element is a line of the objective's representation
